mapper.select: SELECT c.ID, c.NAME, c.TYPE, c.CODE, c.PID, c.PATH, c.SORT, c.DES, c.MENU_ROUTE, c.CREAT_USER, c.CREAT_DATE, c.UPDATE_USER, c.UPDATE_DATE FROM base_user_role_r a INNER JOIN base_role_resource_r b ON a.ROLE_ID = b.ROLE_ID INNER JOIN base_resource c ON c.ID = b.RESOURCE_ID WHERE a.USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND c.PID = '-1' AND c.TYPE= 1 ORDER BY c.SORT
SELECT * FROM base_resource a WHERE a.TYPE = 1 ORDER BY a.SORT
SELECT * FROM base_resource a WHERE a.PATH LIKE #{pattern} AND a.`CODE` != #{moduleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY a.SORT

SELECT c.* FROM base_user_role_r a INNER JOIN base_role_resource_r b ON a.ROLE_ID = b.ROLE_ID INNER JOIN base_resource c ON b.RESOURCE_ID = c.ID WHERE c.PATH LIKE #{pattern} AND c.`CODE` != #{moduleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND a.ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY c.SORT
